articles.author: Josh Xiao and Yihui Xie / Bloomberg
articles.title: Former Singapore Minister Accused of Graft Pleads Guilty to Obstruction of Justice
articles.description: The court hearing regarding Singapore’s biggest political scandal in decades—testing the ruling party’s reputation for clean governance—comes at a politically sensitive time: ahead of the next general election.
articles.content: Singapores former transport minister has pleaded guilty to charges including obstruction of justice after the city-states prosecution amended the indictment against him, a surprising twist to the big… [+3213 chars]

articles.title: Singapore to start landmark graft trial of former minister S Iswaran
articles.description: The case against Iswaran, a former party member, is a test for a party that has long relied on its reputation for clean governance to win all elections since Singapore's independence in 1965

articles.title: IndyCar Driver Confirms Shock Exit From Ed Carpenter Racing
articles.description: IndyCar driver Rinus VeeKay announces his departure from Ed Carpenter Racing after a successful tenure opening up a seat for 2025.
articles.content:
IndyCar driver Rinus VeeKay has announced his departure from Ed Carpenter Racing, leaving him without a team for the upcoming season.
